options.content: High-level overview of core profiling system metrics: scrapes, profiles, and current ingestion.
Core nodes and Go metrics for the hosts. Look for high usage and abnormal spikes.

Overview of data from remote write interface used by [parca-agent](https://github.com/canonical/parca-agent-operator) and applications sending profile data directly. Look for drops in regular ingestion levels / errors.
Overview of queries to Parca. Look for errors / sudden spikes.

panels.description: These are the requests that query the overview metrics for profiles over a given time range.
panels.title: QueryRange Requests

panels.description: These are requests that show the actual profiles.
panels.title: Query Requests

panels.description: These are the requests that return label names and values, usually used in UIs for label suggestions.
panels.title: Labels Requests

options.content: Overview of storage from compaction perspective. Look for drops in compaction or increase in data at lower levels.
